pages.text: ProudSoul, it's a very mysterious substance that we can not fully understand. $(br) It can enchant your blade if has Enchantment. And it also can also be used as a special material, for crafting, fixing  by using anvil, and something we don't know.
Another point, proudsoul can make oak fence change to blade stand. Just sneaking and right-click fence with proudsoul.$(br) Different proudsouls bring different styles
To get ProudSoul, use your slashblade and when the blade break,you will get 1~9 proudsouls,depend on blade's Proudsoul number.
